description: {"blocks":[{"key":"i3ma","text":"We use a simple and effective method for generating 757bp of the N terminal domain of thetheSARS-CoV-2 Spike gene for variant surveillance,      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ac8b","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh142","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8fed1","text":"The Automated extraction was handled using the ExiPrep™ 96 Lite (A-5250, BIONEER) with the ExiPrep™ Viral DNA/RNA extraction kit (K-4614, BIONEER). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sf64","text":"TaqPath™ COVID‑19 CE‑IVD RT‑PCR Kit (Multiplex real-time RT-PCR test intended for qualitatively detecting nucleic acid from SARS‑CoV‑2) used for viral detection. follow the user manual recommendation as listed in the following link: https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets/LSG/manuals/MAN0019215_TaqPathCOVID-19_CE-IVD_RT-PCR%20Kit_IFU.pdf ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":233,"length":109}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"709CEF38EB8C11EDAF590A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets/LSG/manuals/MAN0019215_TaqPathCOVID-19_CE-IVD_RT-PCR%20Kit_IFU.pdf"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c0fa1","text":"Promega GoScript™ Reverse Transcription Mix with Random Primers system (A2800) is used to generate complementary DNA. following the same kit-recommended procedure. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bcl5f","text":"Results can be distinguished to: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6rdn","text":"1- samples with three positive targets for (ORF1ab, N, and S genes) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77dkr","text":"2- sample with two positive targets for (ORF1ab and N genes), negative for theS gene. Failure of Spike gene amplification is referred to as S gene target failure (SGTF) or S gene signal dropdown. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1493d","text":"3- SGTF resulted due to 69/70 codons deletion of Valine and Histidine, respectively.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arv3m","text":"Quality checking is considered for all steps using the Fluorometer Quantus using  Quantifluor dye","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6k2u","text":"the forward primer is: SubA_21587F: CCACTAGTCTCTAGTCAGTGTGTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cuu6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9tm9","text":"Reverse primer: SubA_22344R: CCAGCTGTCCAACCTGAAGA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5l60h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ej7c","text":"these primers generate an amplicon of 757bp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tfi1","text":"Primer's preparation: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ess89","text":"These primers were supplied by Macrogen Company in a lyophilized form. Lyophilized primers were dissolved in nuclease-free water to give a final concentration of 100pmol/μl as a stock solution. A working solution of these primers was prepared by adding 10μl of primer stock solution (stored at freezer -20 C) to 90μl of nuclease-free water to obtain a working primer solution of 10pmol/μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"681p8","text":"Amplification reaction carried on using the flowing calculations: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5f2m8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hr0f","text":"1- 10 ul of GoTag Green Master Mix, Promega (M7122). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ib1n","text":"2- 1 ul of Forward primer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72o33","text":"3- 1ul of Reverse primer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aljpi","text":"4- 6 ul of nuclease-free water ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"772tk","text":"5- 2ul of cDNA template. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3imk","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"519dg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eein","text":"We use the classic gel visualization method through gel electrophoresis (100-1500 bp ladder gel marker) and gel documentation.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45h5d","text":"We referred our amplicons to a sequencing company (Macrogen, South Korea).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
